introduction_english: The word we'll be learning in this section is こうぶつ which you will often hear in conversations related to geology, science, and industrial applications.
meaning_explanation_english: The word "こうぶつ" means "mineral" in English. It refers to naturally occurring substances that have a definite chemical composition, crystalline structure, and physical properties. Minerals are typically found as part of rocks and play a crucial role in various geological and industrial processes.
kanji_explanation: This word is usually written in kana, so there are no kanji to explain.
synonyms: 鉱石 : こうせき : ore
synonym_explanation: The most common synonyms of the "こうぶつ" are "鉱石" and "元素." "こうせき" mainly refers to ores, which are specific types of minerals that are mined for valuable elements. "げんそ" refers to chemical elements, highlighting the compositional aspect of "こうぶつ" but on a more foundational level.
antonyms: 有機物 : ゆうきぶつ : organic matter
生物 : せいぶつ : living thing
antonym_explanation: The most common antonyms of the "こうぶつ" are "ゆうきぶつ" and "せいぶつ." "ゆうきぶつ" stands for "organic matter," emphasizing the contrast between inorganic minerals and organic substances, while "せいぶつ" means "living thing," directly opposing the non-living nature of minerals.

example_sentences.furigana: 鉱物(こうぶつ)資料(しりょう)を見(み)ました。

translations.VI: Tôi đã thấy tài liệu khoáng sản.
translations.TL: Nakakita ako ng mga mineral na materyales.
translations.MY: ကျွန်တော်မင်္ဂလာစာရွက်ကိုမြင်ခဲ့သည်။

example_sentences.kanji: この国は鉱物資源が豊富です。
example_sentences.furigana: この国(くに)は鉱物資源(こうぶつしげん)が豊富(ほうふ)です。

translations.EN: This country is rich in mineral resources.
translations.ID: Negara ini kaya akan sumber daya mineral.
translations.ES: Este país tiene abundantes recursos minerales.
translations.VI: Quốc gia này giàu tài nguyên khoáng sản.
translations.FR: Ce pays est riche en ressources minérales.
translations.NE: यो देश खनिज स्रोतमा धनी छ।
translations.ZH: 这个国家矿物资源丰富。
translations.TL: Ang bansang ito ay mayaman sa yamang mineral.
translations.MY: ဒီနိုင့်ငံက သတ္တုဖယောင်းများအားဖြင့် ပေါများသည်။
translations.HI: यह देश खनिज संसाधनों में समृद्ध है।
translations.FA: این کشور از منابع معدنی غنی است.

example_sentences.kanji: 鉱物研究は楽しいです。
example_sentences.furigana: 鉱物(こうぶつ)研究(けんきゅう)は楽(たの)しいです。

translations.ES: La investigación sobre minerales es divertida.
translations.VI: Nghiên cứu khoáng sản rất thú vị.
translations.FR: La recherche sur les minéraux est amusante.
translations.MY: သတ္တုသုတေသနက မိုက်တယ်။
translations.FA: تحقیق در مورد مواد معدنی سرگرم کننده است.

example_sentences.furigana: 私(わたし)は鉱物(こうぶつ)が好き(すき)です。

translations.MY: ငါသည် သတ္တုများကို နှစ်သက်သည်။
translations.FA: من مواد معدنی را دوست دارم.

example_sentences.kanji: 鉱物はこうぶつ設計の基本です。
example_sentences.furigana: 鉱物(こうぶつ)はこうぶつ設計(こうぶつせっけい)の基本(きほん)です。

translations.EN: Minerals are the foundation of mineral design.
translations.ID: Mineral adalah dasar dari desain mineral.
translations.ES: Los minerales son la base del diseño mineral.
translations.VI: Khoáng sản là nền tảng của thiết kế khoáng sản.
translations.FR: Les minéraux sont la base du design minéral.
translations.ZH: 矿物是矿物设计的基础。
translations.TL: Ang mga mineral ay pundasyon ng disenyo ng mineral.
translations.MY: သတ္တုများသည် သတ္တုဒီဇိုင်း၏ အခြေခံဖြစ်သည်။
translations.HI: खनिज खनिज डिजाइन की नींव हैं।
